original_text: On its hem you shall make pomegranates of blue and purple and scarlet yarns, around its hem, with bells of gold between them,
korean_text: 그 옷 가장자리로 돌아가며 청색 자색 홍색 실로 석류를 수 놓고 금 방울을 간격을 두어 달되

sentences.original_text: you shall make pomegranates of blue and purple and scarlet yarns
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 청색과 자색과 홍색 실로 석류를 만들되

sentences.original_text: with bells of gold between them
